trends: There have been no other sightings in Nova Zagora
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: 5 lights, 3 of them in triangle formation 2 of them in the back side closed together.
divs: Sighting DetailsThat is told to me by my friends. On 29.09.2011 about 19:49 they take picture of a five (5) lights that hovers in formation over Nova Zagora central square. They stood on a bench and talking, and suddenly they saw these lights in formation that drifted to the northeast and one of my friends captured them with his mobile phone.
